titles.title: A checklist of the Amphibians and Reptiles of Costa Rica: Additions and nomenclatural revisions

descriptions.description: Savage, Jay M., Bolaños, Federico (2009): A checklist of the Amphibians and Reptiles of Costa Rica: Additions and nomenclatural revisions. Zootaxa 2005: 1-23, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274674
